name: Rockhopper
description:
This is a little game I wrote while learning the basics of pico-8.

It is inspired by Rock Hopper for the Amstrad CPC computer which was one of the first games I played when around 5 years old. http://www.cpcwiki.eu/index.php/Rock_Hopper

It's quite basic but hopefully someone will get a few minutes fun from it :)

It can be found on the pico-8 BBS here: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=75129#p
